abstract: Hillary Rodham Clinton, who has declined to take a position on the Keystone XL pipeline until the Obama administration decided whether to back it, told a voter in New Hampshire that she would not wait forever.

headline.main: Verbatim: Hillary Clinton Suggests White House Moving Too Slowly on Keystone

snippet: Hillary Rodham Clinton, who has declined to take a position on the Keystone XL pipeline until the Obama administration decided whether to back it, told a voter in New Hampshire that she would not wait forever.
